about_the_game:
Kingdoms Rise and Fall



An engrossing real-time strategy game with grand strategy elements that embarks players on an epic journey through various historical eras and beyond.



This sprawling game offers an in-depth experience that spans various historical eras, from the distant past to the far future.

In Kingdoms Rise and Fall there are:

Over 200 military units operating on the ground, sea, and air— from spearman to battleships to stealth bombers.
Over 80 buildings with upgrades and technologies that will take your kingdom from a small tribe to a modern society.
Almost a dozen maps including maps of Europe, the Pacific, and more!
Tough AI opponents who learn grow and fight their own unique ways.
Multiplayer using steam that allows up to 8 players to battle over the 10+ map

Players start with a humble Stone Age settlement. The game progresses through different ages, each offering unique challenges and opportunities. Players must gather resources, cultivate crops, develop tools, and advance their civilization. They'll evolve from primitive societies to global superpowers, equipped with modern technology like nuclear weapons, tanks, rockets, and towering skyscrapers.



Immersive 3D Maps

Explore immersive 3D maps with stunning visuals and various game modes, including barbarian survival, undead apocalypse, alien invasion, and real-time strategy battle royale.



Wildlife Encounters

Encounter a diverse array of animals during your hunts, including deer, giraffes, and elephants. Beware of formidable early-game creatures like bears and wolves.



Adaptive AI Opponents

Challenge intelligent AI opponents that adapt their strategies in every game you play. Watch as they expand their societies, conduct research, and upgrade their capabilities alongside you.



Historical Progression

Start with a humble Stone Age settlement and progress through different historical eras, including classical, Middle Ages, enlightenment, industrialization, and modernity.





Resource Management

Gather nearly 30 different resources, including luxury and strategic resources. Manage resource depletion, trade on the international market, and fight for vital resources.





Weather and Global Catastrophes

Experience natural disasters like hurricanes, tornadoes, and severe storms, affecting your empire's stability and resources.





Unit Variety

Control various units, from infantry to tanks, aircraft, and even spies, assassins, and snipers, each with unique strengths and roles. Units from all over the world and history are featured. Such as ninjas, samurai, hoplites, roman legions and more!




The Grand (RTS) Strategy Format

Kingdoms Rise and Fall stands out by blending traditional real-time strategy elements with the grand strategy format. Players are tasked with nurturing a small village into a thriving empire, while simultaneously dealing with a plethora of challenges that test their strategic prowess. These challenges include disease outbreaks, pandemics, barbarian invasions, and even supernatural occurrences like undead uprisings or alien invasions, depending on the chosen map or preferences.



Technological Advancements

Research plays a crucial role in the game's progression. Starting with rudimentary tools like clubs and spears, players gradually advance their civilizations by unlocking technologies such as iron and bronze making, gunpowder, nuclear missiles, and space travel. Each technological leap opens up new possibilities and units, significantly affecting the course of the game.



Happiness and Civil Unrest

Maintaining happiness among your citizens is paramount. Happiness can be gained by trading luxury resources or through other in-game means. However, it can be lost through defeats in battles, the death of soldiers, the demise of citizens, or the destruction of buildings. Civil unrest poses a constant threat and can spread through regions with distant buildings or units. Players must manage civil unrest carefully, especially when transitioning between different government systems and ideologies.

Multiplayer and Endless Possibilities

The game will soon support multiplayer matches for up to 8 players, allowing for intense competition and collaboration. There is no population or building limit, meaning you can develop expansive empires with thousands of buildings and units.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 630 Pro or similar (using "Basic" mode in graphics settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Kingdoms Rise and Fall is a captivating Real-Time Strategy game that takes you on an epic journey through different eras, spanning the entirety of history and beyond! Kingdoms Rise & Fall focuses more on culture, science, and keeping your nation happy over time.
